xt:property.name: Usage (%)
xt:property.description: The percentage of consumed vs entitled resource

xt:property.filterExpression: parttype=='License' & part=='Cloud Compute Cores' | ecisvc=='Cloud Compute' & name=='ServiceProcessorCount'
parttype=='License' & part=='Cloud Compute Storage' | ecisvc=='Cloud Compute' & name=='ServiceRawCapacity'

xt:property.name: IP
xt:property.description: Management IP. All IP addresses are available when you drill-down.

xt:property.displayedProperties: devdesc domain[Domain] cpu[CPU Details] nbcpu[CPU Count] memory[Physical Memory (MB)] model vendor[Device Vendor]

xt:property.name: Is Used ?
xt:property.description: "Is Used ?" means there is a File System, a VolumeGroup or a Partition using the disk

xt:property.name: CPU limit
xt:property.description: # of CPU given to the container (default is the same as No. CPU)

xt:property.name: No. CPU
xt:property.description: Number of CPU for the server
100 % means a full core is used

This report shows the activity of the container on particular Block Devices.
A Block Device can be a Loop Device (device mapper), a raw disk (/dev/sdX) or another type of Block Device (PV).
Show instances associated with the selected flavor that are over-provisioned. They are either utilizing less than 50% CPU or less than 50% memory.
Show instances associated with the selected flavor that are overused. They are either utilizing more than 90% CPU or more than 90% memory.
Show instances associated with the selected flavor.
